name: The Mosquito
description:
Brief:

The Mosquito game is fun and quick single screen survival game

Rules:

You need to collect blood and dodge the red reticle which represents the angry old man chasing you and trying to get you. There are 3 different spots where you can land on the old man character. The 3 landing spots are on the head, the arm and the leg. 

You win the game after the green bar is full

You loose the game when you loose the 3 hearts

Other:

This game is made using Unity and it is a proof of concept. This is just a Unity practice and is not a commercial game

The game may get updates if more than few people are interested to play this game

The game is made by 2 person team over the course of 1,5 months

All assets that are used in this game are licensed for commercial use even though this game is free to play
